text: This product is absolutely fantastic! Best purchase I've made all year. The quality is superb and it arrived ahead of schedule.
Terrible experience. The item arrived broken and customer service was unhelpful. Total waste of money.
I love everything about this! The design is beautiful, it works perfectly, and the price was very reasonable.
It's fine. Does what it says on the box. Nothing remarkable but nothing wrong with it either.

Really happy with my purchase. The build quality is excellent and it exceeded my expectations.
Complete disappointment. The product looks nothing like the pictures and feels cheap.
